title: Constructivist Task-Centered Gamification Program for Enhancing Digital-Based Language Acquisition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate-level foreign language communication skills
context.additional_context: Foreign language proficiency improvement course linked to social studies for office/administrative professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can generate work-related situational foreign language dialogues with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can improve communication skills by conducting peer and self-evaluations at least three times during gamified task-solving processes.
Learners can complete five or more language-use scenarios resembling real work environments through LMS-based constructivist learning activities.

resources: Virtual whiteboard tool for collaborative learning

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
